source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
PM.PRODUCT_MAIN_ID as Item, 
PM.ITEM_COMPONENT_QUANTITY as Item_Components,
PM.ITEM_FRIENDLY_DESCRIPTION as Item_Description,
PM.SERIES_NUMBER as Series,
PM.SERIES_NAME as Group_Description,
PM.STATUS as Status,
PM.ITEM_HS_PRODUCT_LINE as Product_Line,
PM.ITEM_RETAIL_TYPE as Grouping,
PM.ITEM_TYPE as Item_Type,
PM.ITEM_IMPORT_DOMESTIC as Domestic_Import,
PM.ITEM_FUTURE_STATUS as PD_Status,
NA.HERO_SKU as HERO_SKU,
NA.BUSINESS_CHANNEL as Business_Channel,
NA.STORE_AREA as Store_Area,
--NPL.PRIMARY_LOOK as Primary_Look,
--NSL.SECONDARY_LOOK as Secondary_Look,
NA.PRIMARY_LOOK as Primary_Look,
NA.SECONDARY_LOOK as Secondary_Look,
NA.GOOD_BETTER_BEST as Good_Better_Best,
NA.CMDT_EXCLSV_PRPRTRY_SGNTR as E_P_SD_SDC,
NA.MONTH as Month,
NA.MARKET_INTRODUCTION as Market_Introduction,
NA.SIZE_SHAPE as Size_Shape,
NA.FEATURE1 as Feature1,
NA.FEATURE2 as Feature2,
NA.FOUNDATION as Foundation,
--NPM.PROGRAM as Program,
NA.PROGRAM as Program,
NA.ASSORTMENT as Assortment,
NA.B_CREDATE as Create_Date,
NA.B_UPDDATE as Update_Date,
NA.B_CREATOR as Creator,
NA.B_UPDATOR as Updator,
NA.Entry_date,
NA.Exit_date
FROM GD_NATIONAL_ASSORTMENT NA INNER JOIN GD_PRODUCT_MAIN PM
ON NA.F_PRODUCT_MAIN_ITEM = PM.PRODUCT_MAIN_ID
/*
LEFT JOIN GD_NA_PRIMARY_LOOK_REF NPL
ON NA.F_PRIMARY_LOOK_REF = NPL.NA_PRIMARY_LOOK_REF_ID
LEFT JOIN GD_NA_SECONDARY_LOOK_REF NSL
ON NA.F_SECONDARY_LOOK_REF = NSL.NA_SECONDARY_LOOK_REF_ID
LEFT JOIN GD_NA_PROGRAM_REF NPM
ON NA.F_PROGRAM_REF = NPM.NA_PROGRAM_REF_ID
*/

SELECT 
PG.PRODUCT_GROUP_ID as Product_Group_ID,
PG.CATEGORY as Category,
PG.GROUP_NAME as Group_Name,
PG.ITEM_DESCRIPTION as Item_Description,
SS.F_ITEM as ITEM,
PM.ITEM_COMPONENT_QUANTITY as Item_Components,
PM.SERIES_NAME as Group_Description,
PM.SERIES_NUMBER as Serires_Number,
SS.B_CREDATE as Create_Date,
SS.B_UPDDATE as Update_Date,
SS.B_CREATOR as Creator,
SS.B_UPDATOR as Updator
FROM GD_PRODUCT_GROUP PG INNER JOIN GD_SISTER_SKU SS
 ON PG.PRODUCT_GROUP_ID = SS.F_PRODUCT_GROUP
 INNER JOIN GD_PRODUCT_MAIN PM
 ON SS.F_ITEM = PM.PRODUCT_MAIN_ID

SELECT 
PG.PRODUCT_GROUP_ID as Product_Group_ID,
PG.CATEGORY as Category,
PG.GROUP_NAME as Group_Name,
PG.ITEM_DESCRIPTION as Item_Description,
CW.F_ITEM as ITEM,
PM.ITEM_COMPONENT_QUANTITY as Item_Components,
PM.SERIES_NAME as Group_Description,
PM.SERIES_NUMBER as Serires_Number,
CW.B_CREDATE as Create_Date,
CW.B_UPDDATE as Update_Date,
CW.B_CREATOR as Creator,
CW.B_UPDATOR as Updator
FROM GD_PRODUCT_GROUP PG INNER JOIN GD_COLORWHEEL CW
 ON PG.PRODUCT_GROUP_ID = CW.F_PRODUCT_GROUP
 INNER JOIN GD_PRODUCT_MAIN PM
 ON CW.F_ITEM = PM.PRODUCT_MAIN_ID

SELECT 
	  c.SERIES_NUMBER 
	  ,c.SERIES_NAME
	  ,c.ITEM_HS_PRODUCT_LINE AS Category
	  , b.FOUNDATION AS National_Foundation
      ,a.[WEST_FOUNDATION] AS West_Foundation
      ,a.[West_OUTLET] AS West_Outlet
	   , a.[B_CREDATE] AS Create_Date
      ,a.[B_UPDDATE] AS Update_Date
      ,a.[B_CREATOR] AS Creator
      ,a.[B_UPDATOR] AS Updator
  FROM [dbo].[GD_WEST_FOUNDATION] a
  LEFT JOIN dbo.GD_NATIONAL_ASSORTMENT b
  ON a.F_NATIONAL_ASSORTMENT = b.NATIONAL_ASSORTMENT_ID
  LEFT JOIN dbo.GD_PRODUCT_MAIN c
  ON b.F_PRODUCT_MAIN_ITEM = c.PRODUCT_MAIN_ID

SELECT 
	  c.SERIES_NUMBER 
	  ,c.SERIES_NAME
	  ,c.ITEM_HS_PRODUCT_LINE AS Category
	  , b.FOUNDATION AS National_Foundation
      ,a.[EAST_FOUNDATION] AS East_Foundation
      ,a.[EAST_OUTLET] AS East_Outlet
	   , a.[B_CREDATE] AS Create_Date
      ,a.[B_UPDDATE] AS Update_Date
      ,a.[B_CREATOR] AS Creator
      ,a.[B_UPDATOR] AS Updator
  FROM [dbo].[GD_EAST_FOUNDATION] a
  LEFT JOIN dbo.GD_NATIONAL_ASSORTMENT b
  ON a.F_NATIONAL_ASSORTMENT = b.NATIONAL_ASSORTMENT_ID
  LEFT JOIN dbo.GD_PRODUCT_MAIN c
  ON b.F_PRODUCT_MAIN_ITEM = c.PRODUCT_MAIN_ID
